channel.title: 508 server need help!
channel.description: i have just recently made a 508 server not really fimilar with them how do you change people to admins mods, and change the welcome message thanks

item.title: 508 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

or search for a person who currently is admin or mod and change your name to theirs

item.title: 508 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @Soul-Scape Soul-Scape
item.description:
@Soul-Scape wrote:

To change players to admin and mod you have to go into your character folder by going to a folder called data. Just look around in all the files until you find it. Then in the character file simply open what character you want with wordpad and look for rights or something like that and put it to 1 for mod or 2 for admin.
By the way there is no owner rights in 508â€™s

To change the welcome message go to login.java i believe.

Read full topic
